An appendix to the answer unto two Athenian Mercuries concerning pedo-baptism containing twenty seven syllogistical arguments proving infant-baptism a mere humane tradition : the gentlmen called the Athenian Society desiring in the last of the said Mercuries to have syllogism / by B. K. Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
[2], 8 p.
Printed for the author and sold by John Harris ..., London : 1692.
Written by Benjamin Keach. Cf. Halkett & Laing. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
